card.name: [OP] Nami [OP01-016]
card.text: [On Play] Look at 5 cards from the top of your deck; reveal up to 1 {Straw Hat Crew} type card other than [Nami] and add it to your hand. Then, place the rest at the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: [OP] Roronoa Zoro [OP01-025]
card.text: [Rush] (This card can attack on the turn in which it is played.)

card.name: [OP] Trafalgar Law [ST10-001]
card.text: [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] DON!! −3 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck.): Place up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 3000 power or less at the bottom of the owner's deck, and play up to 1 Character card with a cost of 4 or less from your hand.

card.name: [OP] Monkey.D.Luffy [ST10-002]
card.text: [Activate: Main] [Once Per Turn] If you have 0 DON!! cards on your field or 8 or more DON!! cards on your field, add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active.

card.name: [OP] Eustass"Captain"Kid [ST10-003]
card.text: [Your Turn] If you have 4 or more Life cards, give this Leader −1000 power. [When Attacking] DON!! −1 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck.): This Leader gains +2000 power during this turn.

card.name: [OP] Sanji [ST10-004]
card.text: [On Play] If your opponent has a Character with 5000 or more power, this Character gains [Rush] during this turn. (This card can attack on the turn in which it is played.)

card.name: [OP] Jinbe [ST10-005]
card.text: [DON!! x1] [When Attacking] Give up to 1 of your opponent's Characters −2000 power during this turn.

card.name: [OP] Monkey.D.Luffy [ST10-006]
card.text: [Rush] (This card can attack on the turn in which it is played.) [Once Per Turn] When your opponent activates a [Blocker], K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 8000 power or less.

card.name: [OP] Killer [ST10-007]
card.text: [Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When a DON!! card on your field is returned to your DON!! deck, K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's rested Characters with a cost of 3 or less.

card.name: [OP] Shachi & Penguin [ST10-008]
card.text: [On Play] If you have 3 or less DON!! cards on your field, add up to 2 DON!! cards from your DON!! deck and rest them.

card.name: [OP] Jean Bart [ST10-009]
card.text: [On Play] ➀ (You may rest the specified number of DON!! cards in your cost area.): Add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active.

card.name: [OP] Trafalgar Law [ST10-010]
card.text: [Blocker] (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.) [On Play] DON!! −1 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck.): If your opponent has 7 or more cards in their hand, trash 2 cards from your opponent's hand.

card.name: [OP] Heat [ST10-011]
card.text: [Your Turn] [Once Per Turn] When a DON!! card on your field is returned to your DON!! deck, this Character gains +2000 power until the start of your next turn.

card.name: [OP] Bepo [ST10-012]
card.text: [On Play]/[When Attacking] If your opponent has more DON!! cards on their field than you, add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and rest it.

card.name: [OP] Eustass"Captain"Kid [ST10-013]
card.text: [On Play]/[When Attacking] DON!! −1 (You may return the specified number of DON!! cards from your field to your DON!! deck.): Up to 1 of your Leader gains +1000 power until the start of your next turn.

card.name: [OP] Wire [ST10-014]
card.text: [Blocker] (After your opponent declares an attack, you may rest this card to make it the new target of the attack.) [Once Per Turn] When a DON!! card on your field is returned to your DON!! deck, draw 1 card and trash 1 card from your hand.

card.name: [OP] Gum-Gum Giant Sumo Slap [ST10-015]
card.text: [Counter] Up to 1 of your Leader or Character cards gains +2000 power during this battle, and K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 2000 power or less.

card.name: [OP] Gum-Gum Kong Gatling [ST10-016]
card.text: [Main] K.O. up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with 7000 power or less. [Trigger] Up to 1 of your Leader gains +1000 power until the end of your next turn.

card.name: [OP] Punk Vise [ST10-017]
card.text: [Main] Rest up to 1 of your opponent's Characters with a cost of 2 or less, and add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and rest it. [Trigger] Add up to 1 DON!! card from your DON!! deck and set it as active.
